verses.verse: There was a <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H347>Job<s%>; and that <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H8535>perfect<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%>, and one that <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and turned away <S%H5493>from<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

Have not you made a <S%H7753>hedge<s%> about <S%H1157>him<s%>, and about his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and about all that he has on every <S%H5439>side<s%>? you have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and his <S%H4735>substance<s%> is <S%H6555>increased<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
<S%H199>But<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5060>now<s%>, and touch all that he <S%H1288>has<s%>, and he will curse you to your <S%H6440>face<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, <S%H3027>Behold<s%>, all that he has is in your power; only upon himself put not <S%H7971>forth<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%>. So <S%H7854>Satan<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And there was a <S%H3117>day<s%> when his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>oldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>:

And there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> unto <S%H347>Job<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1241>oxen<s%> were <S%H2790>plowing<s%>, and the <S%H860>donkeys<s%> <S%H7462>feeding<s%> beside <S%H3027>them<s%>:

And the <S%H7614>Sabeans<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon <S%H3947>them<s%>, and took them away; <S%H5221>Yes<s%>, they have slain the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and I only am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> alone to tell <S%H5046>you<s%>.

While he was yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H559>another<s%>, and said, The <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and has burned <S%H1197>up<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and the <S%H5288>servants<s%>, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H4422>them<s%>; and I only am escaped alone to tell <S%H5046>you<s%>.

While he was yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H559>another<s%>, and said, The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> made <S%H7760>out<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>bands<s%>, and <S%H6584>fell<s%> upon the <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and have carried them <S%H3947>away<s%>, <S%H5221>Yes<s%>, and slain the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and I only am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> alone to tell <S%H5046>you<s%>.

While he was yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H559>another<s%>, and said, Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>oldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>:

<S%H935>And<s%>, behold, there came a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5676>from<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H5060>struck<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and it <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon the young <S%H5288>men<s%>, and they are <S%H4191>dead<s%>; and I only am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> alone to tell <S%H5046>you<s%>.

Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H4598>mantle<s%>, and <S%H1494>shaved<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%>,
